name: Home
text:
This is a community wiki dedicated to [http://jruby.codehaus.org/Home JRuby], an 100% pure-Java implementation of the [http://www.ruby-lang.org/en Ruby] programming language.. '''NOTE: This wiki is located at wiki.jruby.org; please update your links.''' * [[About JRuby]] * [[Getting Started]] * [[Roadmap]] ==News and Updates== * 2008-07-19 [[JRuby 1.1.3|Latest Release in 1.1 series: 1.1.3]] * [[Script Bowl 2008|JRuby's entries in JavaOne Script Bowl 2008]] * [[JRuby 1.0|Latest Release in 1.0 series: 1.0.3]]
==Using JRuby== * [[Applications]] * [[Java Integration | Java Integration (Calling JRuby from Java)]] * [[Calling Java from JRuby]] * [[JRuby on OS X]] * [[JRuby on Ubuntu]] * [[JRuby Compiler]] * [[Performance Tuning]] * [[Ruby/JRuby_Security]] A New Security Implementation to Replace SAFE/TAINT) * NEW! [[Walkthroughs and Tutorials]] * [[Success Stories]] * [[GUI Frameworks]] * [[JRuby on Eclipse RCP]] A case study * [[JRuby on Java Micro Edition]] * [[JRuby on Web Start]] * [[JRuby and Continuous Integration]] * [[Hpricot]] * [[Mentawai]] A Java web framework fully supporting Ruby through JRuby * [[Rubygems]] ==[[JRuby on Rails]]== * [[Running Rails with ActiveRecord-JDBC|ActiveRecord-JDBC]] * [[Warbler]] (minimal, flexible, ruby-like way to create .war file) * [http://blog.emptyway.com/2008/04/08/120-seconds-guide-to-jruby-on-rails| 120 seconds guide to JRuby on Rails] * [[Goldspike]] Servlet to Rails bridge (deprecated, see [[Warbler]]) * [[Jruby on Rails on Tomcat]] (Rails 1.1 & 2.0) * [[JRuby on Rails on Jetty]] * [[JRuby on Rails in GlassFish]] (Open Source Java EE Application Server) * [[JRuby on Rails on WebSphere]] * [http://wiki.oracle.com/page/JRuby+on+Rails%3A+Deploying+to+Oracle+Containers+for+Java+EE+%28OC4J%29 JRuby on Rails on Oracle OC4J] * [[JRuby on Rails on BEA Weblogic]] * [[Running Rails with Firebird]] * [[Rails AOT]] (Compiling Rails' controllers and models AOT) * [[Rails Eclipse Jetty Maven]] (Rails on Eclipse + Run Jetty Run + Maven) * [http://kofno.wordpress.com/2008/04/23/writing-an-activerecord-jdbc-adapter/ Writing an ActiveRecord-JDBC adapter] * [[Rails with H2 in JNDI on Jetty]] * [http://blarg.slackworks.com/posts/jruby-service-in-rails JRuby Services in Rails] * [http://blarg.slackworks.com/posts/jndi-with-rails JNDI with Rails] ==[[JRuby on ...]]== * [[JRuby Rack|JRuby-Rack]] (Servlet to Rails bridge, plus other Ruby web frameworks) * [[Merb|Merb]]
==Getting Involved== * [[Mailing Lists]] * [http://svn.codehaus.org/jruby JRuby Source Repository] * [http://svn.jruby.codehaus.org Fisheye (track changes, SVN RSS feed)] * [http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/JRUBY JIRA (bug tracking)] * [http://jruby.thresher.com/ JRuby build server] * [[JRuby Bug Reporting Style Guide]] * [[JRuby Style Guide]] * [[Making a Patch on NetBeans]] * [[JRuby presentations]] * [[IRC]] * [http://blog.emptyway.com/2008/03/27/how-to-contribute-to-jruby-effectively How to contribute to JRuby effectively] * [[JRuby and RubySpecs]] ==Hints, Tips and Documents== * [[FAQs]] * [[Status]] (Standard libraries, supported applications, Ruby 1.8.5 compatibility) * [[JRuby Cookbook]] * [[Require and Load behavior]] * [[Using the JRuby Debugger]] * [[Troubleshooting]] * [[Differences between mri and jruby]] * [[JRuby on HPUX 11.23]] * [[Spring | JRuby and Spring]] * [[Release Documentation]] * [[JRuby hash bang]] * [[JRuby with Nailgun]] (background JRuby server to speed startup) * [[JRuby Internal Design]] * [[JDBC | JRuby and JDBC]] (how to use JDBC directly within JRuby) * [http://blog.dberg.org/2008/07/jms-jruby-producer-and-consumer.html JRuby JMS Producer / Consumer Example] ==Specifications== * [[Compiler Packaging and Pathing]] * [[Compiler Name Mangling]] * [[JIT Compiler]] * [[Static Compiler]] * [[Classpath and Load Path]]
==Downloads== * [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby Latest Releases] * '''JRuby 1.1.3''' ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-bin-1.1.3.tar.gz JRuby 1.1.3 Binary .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-bin-1.1.3.zip JRuby 1.1.3 Binary .zip] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-src-1.1.3.tar.gz JRuby 1.1.3 Source .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-src-1.1.3.zip JRuby 1.1.3 Source .zip] * '''JRuby 1.0.3''' ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-bin-1.0.3.tar.gz JRuby 1.0.3 Binary .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-bin-1.0.3.zip JRuby 1.0.3 Binary .zip] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-src-1.0.3.tar.gz JRuby 1.0.3 Source .tar.gz] ** [http://dist.codehaus.org/jruby/jruby-src-1.0.3.zip JRuby 1.0.3 Source .zip] * [http://jruby.thresher.com/download/JRUBY-TRSNAPINST/artifacts/latest Latest Snapshots] ** [http://jruby.thresher.com/download/JRUBY-TRSNAPINST/artifacts/latest/jruby-bin-snapshot-tar Binary .tar.gz] ** [http://jruby.thresher.com/download/JRUBY-TRSNAPINST/artifacts/latest/jruby-bin-snapshot-zip Binary .zip] * [http://software.opensuse.org/search?baseproject=ALL&p=1&q=jruby OpenSUSE RPM packages] ==[http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/ JRuby Maven Artifacts]== * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby-complete/1.1.3/jruby-complete-1.1.3.jar jruby-complete 1.1.3] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby-complete/1.0.3/jruby-complete-1.0.3.jar jruby-complete 1.0.3] * [http://snapshots.repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby-complete/TRUNK-SNAPSHOT jruby-complete trunk snapshot] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby/1.1.2/jruby-1.1.2.jar jruby 1.1.2] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby/1.0.3/jruby-1.0.3.jar jruby 1.0.3] * [http://snapshots.repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/jruby/TRUNK-SNAPSHOT jruby trunk snapshot] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/joni/joni/1.0.2/joni-1.0.2.jar joni 1.0.2] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/extras/goldspike/1.6/goldspike-1.6.jar goldspike 1.6] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/extras/jna/3.0.1/jna-3.0.1.jar jna 3.0.1] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/extras/jvyamlb/0.1/jvyamlb-0.1.jar jvyamlb 0.1] * [http://repository.codehaus.org/org/jruby/extras/bytelist/0.1/bytelist-0.1.jar bytelist 0.1]
==Related Websites== * http://jruby.codehaus.org/Home * http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JRuby * [http://www.infoq.com/news/2008/05/csi-disease-management-jruby Real world JRuby on Rails: Infectious disease reporting and management] * Try [http://kessel.ilrt.bris.ac.uk/~pldms/2006/12/jruby-applet.html running the JRuby interactive shell as an applet in your browser!] * [http://www.tbray.org/ongoing/When/200x/2006/08/17/JRuby Why JRuby?][http://www.usome.com] (Tim Bray) * [http://rubyforge.org/projects/jruby-extras jruby-extras] (Support for Libraries and Applications not included in standard JRuby) * [http://www.ociweb.com/jnb/jnbApr2007.html Introduction to JRuby] * [http://wiki.glassfish.java.net/Wiki.jsp?page=JRuby GlassFish JRuby Wiki] * [http://blogs.sun.com/theaquarium/tags/jruby GlassFish Aquarium JRuby posts] * [http://pipes.yahoo.com/pipes/pipe.info?_id=oCCxOv9w3BGq_aM_1vC6Jw Fresh JRuby news Yahoo Pipes aggregator] * [http://www.jrubyhub.com JRubyHub.com: The hub for all resources related to JRuby and JRuby on Rails resources] * [http://blogs.sun.com/sabada/entry/deploying_jruby_on_rails_war Deploying JRuby on Rails application on Sun Java System Web Server 7] * [http://wiki.oracle.com/page/JRuby+on+Rails%3A+Oracle+SSO+Integration Integrating Oracle SSO with a JRuby on Rails app] * [https://scripting.dev.java.net/ JSR 223 scripting project home]
